dialogues.speaker: BALD GOON
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: PIERCE
dialogues.text: Give him your fucking parachute. Pierce points his weapon at his subordinate. The Bald Goo hesitates, then pops the chest buckle on his chute and sl it off, holding it out.

dialogues.speaker: ZHAO
dialogues.text: Bring it here. The Bald Goon checks with Pierce who nods: do it. Baldy moves closer, too close now. ZHAO (cont'd) Stop. Drop it there. The Goon does as he's bid. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ZHAO (cont'd) Step back. Zhao holds up the red memory card. ZHAO (cont'd) Here's your card. With that, Zhao suddenly flings the memory card away like mini-Frisbee. Instinctively, everyone turns to watch it g But not Will -- he looks at his daughter and yells:

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Run! And she does. Georgia bolts as Zhao opens fire. Will reaches into the SIDE POCKET of his right pant leg, takin hold of something and PULLING WITH ALL HIS MIGHT TO REVEA THE CHINESE SWORD WHICH HE'D DUCT TAPED TO HIS METAL LEG. It shears through Will's pant leg with ease and he now ho a three-foot razor-sharp blade in his hands. In a flash, Will lunges, driving it through the Bald Goon's sternum a Pierce and his men OPEN FIRE! The entire observation deck erupts into a gunfight as everyone moves to what cover they can find. It's a gunfight in a glass house -- panels shatter, raini down shards left and right, each new opening ushering in howling rush of wind like an airplane emergency door bein thrown open at 40,000 feet. What's more -- with the firelight from below, the entire space takes on the eerie effect of a house of mirrors. Reflections dance in double and triple exposure as this life-and-death finale unfolds in triplicate before us. Amidst this maelstrom of glass and wind and gunfire we fi

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: wedged up behind some cover, his sword at the ready. Out the corner of his eye he spots the REFLECTION OF GEORGIA tucked into a ball covering her ears. He has to get to he Just then, Will sees the BIG MAN rushing toward him. Will throws this sword -- it strikes the Big Man in the chest but, strangely, the Big Man doesn't react -- instead he SHATTERS into a thousand pieces: a reflection. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Which means: THE BIG MAN IS BEHIND WILL. Will spins just in time to knock the muzzle of the Big Ma sub-machine gun aside at it looses a rip of automatic fir In a blink, the two are in a close-quarters grapple to th death. Will quickly gains the upper-hand. The Big Man sees the tables turning against him and drive his thumb into Will's shoulder wound. Will cries out as t Big Man headbutts him, dropping Will to the deck in a daz The Big Man pounces, wrapping his meaty forearms around Will's neck, putting him in a deadly sleeper-hold. Will's seconds away from blacking out. He reaches for the sword -- lying on the rooftop just out of his reach. The Big Man jerks Will away from it, placing himself betw Will and the sword, his back to the SHATTERED GLASS PANEL

dialogues.speaker: BIG MAN
dialogues.text: Nighty-night... cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: ZHAO
dialogues.text: trading shots with Pierce. Zhao ducks back down, reloadin Pierce pulls a GRENADE and tosses it at Zhao. The grenade lands perfectly. Zhao sees it and dives from cover as it explodes, exposing him to Pierce's gun-sites. Pierce unloads, clipping Zhao in the leg as the magnate scrambles for safety.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: being choked out. His fingers stumble numbly over the Big Man's face. The Big Man almost smiles -- it's over. And that's when Will grabs hold of the PARACHUTE'S RELEAS HANDLE. With his last remaining strength, Will pulls it. The Big Man's parachute ejects from his back -- quickly catching the rushing wind and yanking him through the bro glass panel like he was shot out of a cannon -- WHOOM! The Big Man's scream is cut short when his head catches t window transom on the way out -- offering up a meaty THUN (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Will scans the rooftop for Georgia. But instead, he spots

dialogues.speaker: THE RED MEMORY CARD
dialogues.text: lying on the ground out in the open. Will rushes for it, snatching it up and turning to break for cover when he comes face-to-face with the FINAL GOON. No words -- the Goon fires at point blank range: BANG! But the Goon's gun doesn't go off. His torso jerks in thr successive spasms, as he's punched through by three shots falling to reveal Zhao, clutching his gunshot leg.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: You're a pretty good actor for a billionaire.

dialogues.speaker: ZHAO
dialogues.text: How do you think I got to be one? Clearly, Zhao's "double-cross" was part of the plan. Will holds up the memory card...

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Found something for you.

dialogues.speaker: ZHAO
dialogues.text: Great. Now let's get your daugh--

dialogues.speaker: THE AREA ERUPTS INTO SPARKS
dialogues.text: as Pierce has flanked them, unloading his sub-machine gun them. Pierce goes dry -- he curses his luck, ducking down Zhao pitches forward onto Will who pulls him down to safe BEHIND COVER. Will checks Zhao's wounds -- he's been gut-shot badly. Blood pours from his mouth. Not good.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Hang on -- stay with me. Zhao shoves his gun into Will's hands -- the first time h touched one in ten years. Zhao looks him in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: ZHAO
dialogues.text: Find her. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: I'm coming back for you. Will nods and moves off.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: moving through the observation deck, stalking -- looking Georgia, a hair trigger ready for Pierce. Then...

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Daddy! Will spins to see Pierce holding his daughter out on THE EXTENDED DECK. The same place Will stood when he first came up here. Nothing below their feet but a thin piece of glass and a three-thousand foot fall. Pierce holds a grenade in one hand and Georgia against hi body -- making a crack shot difficult. The tableau is a haunting mirror of the farmhouse standof that cost Will so dearly. Will is struck cold.

dialogues.speaker: PIERCE
dialogues.text: You shoot me, I drop this, she dies. Disarm. A pained moment. With no choice, Will obliges -- crouchin down to place his gun on the deck. But... At the last moment, Will fires! But he doesn't fire at Pierce -- HE FIRES AT THE GLASS PA BENEATH HIS FEET. The entire floor panel SHATTERS -- PIER AND GEORGIA FALL STRAIGHT THROUGH IT. Will leaps for the opening -- diving through the hole, reaching out with everything's he's got and, at the last possible second, he catches hold of GEORGIA'S HOODIE. Surprise and horror on his face, Pierce falls away from us -- the GRENADE EXPLODES next him, obliterating the villain in mid-air. A grisly demise. Will yanks his daughter back through the opening -- narro avoiding the blast -- and up to the rooftop. She collapse on his chest. Safe. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Will holds his daughter tight. She clings to him, shaking

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA
dialogues.text: Daddy, I wanna go home. Will kisses the top of her head and exhales.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Me too, honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand barge is little more than a dirt square, made fr the dredge of the surrounding bay, dotted with RUSTED OUT CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT. A forgotten place. Surrounded by three black SUVS and a dozen ARMED MEN, Wu- Jun glasses the top of The Pearl with binoculars. Xia strides up.

dialogues.speaker: XIA
dialogues.text: He's not answering. (beat) He should've been here already. Wu-Sai Jun doesn't like it. His gangster's intuition ringing alarm bells in his mind.

dialogues.speaker: WU-SAI JUN
dialogues.text: We're leaving. He moves for the SUVs when suddenly he sees a pair of HEADLIGHTS racing down the ACCESS ROAD toward them. The headlights split, revealing themselves to be SIX PAIRS, n one -- Hong Kong PD.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE LEAD CAR
dialogues.text: Captain Chan rides shotgun, Lieutenant Han at the wheel. Sarah, vested up, is in the back.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: Get down and stay down. Do not leave the car. Understand? Sarah obliges, scooching down low.

dialogues.speaker: WU-SAI JUN
dialogues.text: screams at his men to open fire -- and they do: unloading the approaching cops with peels of automatic gunfire. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The cops broadside their cars and hop out behind cover, trading shots with the gangsters. The handwriting is on the wall as Chan drops two gangster with crack shots -- they've got the bad guys outnumbered. Jun squats behind a wheel-well, blindly firing. Xia fires expertly, clipping a pair of cops -- but she se the situation is hopeless. One by one, the gangsters drop their weapons and surrende Wu-Sai Jun as well. The cops rush forward to take the bad guys into custody as Xia sneaks off into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: XIA
dialogues.text: slinks through the junkyard, looking for an escape. She spots CAPTAIN CHAN'S CAR unmanned and idling thirty meter away, apart from the round-up taking place by the SUVs. This is her shot -- she hurries

dialogues.speaker: INTO THE CAR
dialogues.text: hopping into the driver's seat and reaching for the gear shift when:

dialogues.speaker: SARAH, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey. Xia looks back just in time to catch the heel of Sarah's boot on the point of her chin -- CRACK! The crisp violenc of the kick knocks Xia out cold. The lady killer slumps like a rag-doll onto the steering wheel -- the horn blares. A beat later, Chan throws open the passenger door to see result. He looks back at Sarah sitting there. She puts he hands up innocently...

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: I never left the car. Chan exhales, relieved. That's when Sarah spots something slipping out of Xia's bag... SARAH (cont'd) That's Will's laptop. Chan and Sarah share a look. She grabs it, opening it up. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Trying to get The Pearl's fire system back online. Sarah noses through the building control app, trying to g a sense of things.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: Do you know how to do that?

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Not remotely.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: But you're good with computers?

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Terrible. But the control program is still open and it seems pretty straightforward...

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: How 'bout we get that to someone who knows what they're doing.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Captain, my husband and daughter are in that building and it's on fire right now. I'm not waiting another god damn second. So you can either arrest me or -- DING! The computer chimes. Sarah spins it to face Chan, showing The Pearl ENTIRELY GREEN from top to bottom with flashing indicator: SYSTEMS ONLINE. SARAH (cont'd) -- you can say thank you. Sarah smiles, Captain Chan shakes his head at her moxie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire observation deck blazes like a house on fire. Will places Georgia next to an injured and weak Zhao.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Stay here. I'll be right back. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA
dialogues.text: No! Don't go!

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: I'll be right back, I promise. Will squeezes his daughter and moves off through the smok and fire searching for

dialogues.speaker: THE PARACHUTE
dialogues.text: which he spots resting on the deck, surrounded by fire. Will's about to make a move for it when suddenly there's EXPLOSION from a NEARBY COOLANT TANK. Will shields his eyes, turning back to see the parachute burning, melted and disfigured and smoking -- useless. The turn of events is gutting -- engulfed by fire, Will a Georgia have no escape. Will returns to Georgia and kneel down next to her, pulling her close... WILL (cont'd) Daddy loves who? Georgia begins to cry...

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA
dialogues.text: Me.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA
dialogues.text: Me. Will holds his daughter tight, protecting her to the last The flames rise around them, a funeral pyre a mile in the air. Suddenly there's a HISSING SOUND. From all sides, The Pearl's anti-fire measures kick in, dousing the observation deck with FLAME-SUPPRESSING FOAM CO2 GAS. Will can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- QUICK CUTS of FIRE SYSTEMS COMING ONLINE on various floors, extinguishing the remaining flames with WATER and FLAME-SUPPRESSING FOAM. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The fire is rapidly quelled. Zhao's building, once enable is a formidable foe and ardent defender of its corpus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GATHERED CROWD stares up at The Pearl, watching as fl by floor, the flashing golden fire is put out. They begin to cheer, slowly at first, then wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first rays of a new day pierce the eastern sky, revealing The Pearl, smoking but standing tall. Unbowed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd has thinned some now. Suddenly a commotion is heard. People pull out their phones, a buzz zips through the gathering as citizens begin to part revealing:

dialogues.speaker: WILL, GEORGIA AND ZHAO
dialogues.text: moving away from The Pearl's MAIN ENTRANCE DOOR. Will carries Georgia in one arm and supports Zhao with the oth The trio collapse. Will calls out to the gawking crowd...

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: Call an ambulance! Suddenly a RUSH OF POLICE OFFICERS push through the crowd surrounding Will, weapons drawn. Will puts his hands up. WILL (cont'd) No -- no -- this man, he needs help! But no one moves. Will implores them... WILL (cont'd) Please! Will's shoulders slump -- after all of this, he's still s as a criminal. It's almost more than he can bear. Just then, a bark of Chinese and the cops part to reveal Captain Chan striding up. A quick nod from Chan allows EM TECHS to pass by and rush to Zhao's aid. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: Will Ford -- I've been dying to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: WILL
dialogues.text: My wife and son? Are they okay? Are they alive?

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN CHAN
dialogues.text: Ask them yourself. Chan swings out of the way to reveal:

dialogues.speaker: SARAH AND HENRY
dialogues.text: pushing through the throng, rushing toward them...

dialogues.speaker: GEORGIA
dialogues.text: Mom! Sarah drops to her knees to hug her daughter as Will watches, emotion overwhelming him -- his family safe. Will moves to them, kneeling down as the trio envelop him their arms. Overcome, tears begin to fall down Will's dir streaked face. We HOLD ON this familial embrace, RISING UP and then, as by miracle, it begins to snow. Tiny swirling flakes that won't survive impact -- but it is snowing all the same. From above we watch the snow fall as a tumult of PEOPLE a PARAMEDICS and POLICE eddy around the quartet. But Will, Sarah, Henry and Georgia remain solid, together a rock amidst a rushing stream. The moment is unmistakable: Will has finally saved the family he couldn't save those many years ago -- his own. FADE OUT.
